attributes.action: Invite the Fraud Squad to Investigate Properly All MPs' Expenses and Prosecute All Who Are Guilty of Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Civil Servant if I claim 1p more than I am allowed to I can be prosecuted, and loose my job and pension! It is also my responsibility to ensure I know the expenses rules before  make any claims! As Civil Servants the same rules should apply to MP's as well! Not just "Oh I'm sorry herte's some money back!"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
